1.text: Spray a mixture of dish soap and water if you want to avoid pesticides.

2.text: Make an alcohol-based insecticide spray to kill earwigs for fast results.

3.text: Sprinkle boric acid powder to kill bugs in areas you can't reach.

4.text: Make lighted earwig traps to kill earwigs outside at night.

5.text: Make oil and soy sauce traps to catch and kill earwigs.

6.text: Vacuum up any large population of earwigs that you find.

7.text: Draw birds to your garden to kill earwigs naturally.

8.text: Apply an earwig pesticide about 6–10 feet (1.8–3.0 m) away from your home.

9.text: Repair any holes in your window screens to keep earwigs out.

10.text: Fill in cracks and holes near entrances to your house with caulk.

11.text: Fix leaking faucets or drains in and around your house.

12.text: Use sodium lights instead of regular lighting outdoors.
